description.short: Go where you want and get there fast, reliably, and in comfort with the perfect lift and suspension setup that your truck or adventure vehicle needs.
description.long: Your off-road vehicle is only as capable as the suspension system will allow. THOR can get you where you want and get there fast, reliably, and in comfort with the perfect lift and suspension setup that your truck or adventure vehicle needs.

content.sidebar:
Want to lift your vehicle or replace the suspension with something better? Well, you came to the right place! As a suspension centric shop we have literally built our entire business around being experts at matching the myriad of suspension options.

If you're on a budget for simple solutions or building the truck of your dreams we'll get you exactly what you need and make sure you love the result. Partnering with brands like Carli Suspension, BDS Suspension, Readylift, Cognito Motorsports , AEV Conversions, just to name a few, means we have the connections to get parts perfect for your adventure.

And we don't just sell parts, we're a professional installation shop as well. THOR Off-Road takes pride in our installations, we take them seriously! With the price of today's trucks and the parts we all want to add, making sure your suspension is properly installed is paramount.

No matter the size of your project, at THOR Off-Road your suspension and lift kit needs are simply a call or email away.

parts.title: Ball Joints
parts.description: Ball joints can be a weak link with larger wheels and tires. Upgrading the ball joints ensures off-road durability.

parts.title: Coilovers
parts.description: Want to upgrade your IFS truck and gain the best ride quality? THOR can provide valued and tuned struts for your truck.

parts.title: Coil Springs
parts.description: Improve articulation and capability by replacing your OE springs with off-road springs. We can help you pick the right setup.

parts.title: Leaf Springs
parts.description: Properly designed leafs and shocks provide an amazing ride. THOR can help you build and design the perfect suspension.

parts.title: Lift Springs
parts.description: If you're hauling heavy loads, proper lift springs are important. We design and install capable lift springs for your ride.

parts.title: Performance Shocks
parts.description: The foundation of any suspension. Tuned performance shocks will provide great ride quality and capability!

parts.title: Radius Arms
parts.description: Radius arm replacement provides durability and cosmetics to your rig. Get your suspension geometry aligned with THOR.

parts.title: Shocks
parts.description: Factory shocks work with factory specs. When modifying your truck you'll need more capability than factory can provide.

parts.title: Steering Stabilizers
parts.description: Properly designed steering stabilizers will give you back the drivability you need after adding off-road parts.

parts.title: Sway Bars
parts.description: Get "independent" feel and solid axle performance with upgraded torsion sway bars installed by THOR.

parts.title: Track Bars
parts.description: When changing ride height, you'll want to install track bars to re-center the axle for best drivability.

seo.title: Texas Carli and Off-Road Suspension HQ
seo.description: THOR Off-Road is the only Carli Suspension stocking dealer in Texas and experts in top brands like Carli, AEV, BDS, Fox, Baja Kits, Dobinsons and Toytec.
